hudson.tasks.Shell.command: #note, needs rpm rpmdevtools installed for spectool test -d elasticsearch-rpms || git clone --depth=1 https://github.com/tavisto/elasticsearch-rpms.git if [ -f /etc/pacifica/jenkins.sh ]; then . /etc/pacifica/jenkins.sh; fi cd elasticsearch-rpms git pull #rpmdev-setuptree #ln -s `pwd`/SPECS/elasticsearch.spec ~/rpmbuild/SPECS/elasticsearch.spec #ln -s `pwd`/SOURCES/* ~/rpmbuild/SOURCES/ export HOME=`pwd` cd SOURCES spectool -g `pwd`/../SPECS/elasticsearch.spec
